thread.title: ClasicasVR

author: ClasicasVR
title: ClasicasVR
text:
I have purchased a SIP fastflow and I only could used It for 20kms, after that starts to lose fuel around the four holes gasket and O throw to the rubbish. Then I purchased a FA ITALIA fuel tap and after 500kms runs as the first day.
EDIT:
Today a member of the SIP staff contact yo me tomo solve the problem offering me a New one, by this I need to change my opinion because they assumed the problem and gave me a solution
